header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.description: Find answers to the most common questions about Boilerplate

questions.title: What is this Micro-SaaS Boilerplate?
questions.content: This Micro-SaaS Boilerplate is a comprehensive starting point for building your own Micro-SaaS applications. It leverages the latest technologies including Next 14, Next Auth, Prisma, Zod, and React Hook Form to provide a robust foundation for your project.

questions.title: What features does this Boilerplate include?
questions.content: The Boilerplate comes packed with essential features for any SaaS application, including plugin support, Stripe Subscriptions for handling payments, user authentication, a blogging platform, a changelog feature, a comprehensive dashboard, and a team system for collaboration.

questions.title: Can I customize the Boilerplate?
questions.content: Absolutely, the Boilerplate is designed to be fully customizable. You can tailor the design, functionality, and features to meet the specific needs of your project, ensuring your application stands out.

questions.title: How does authentication work?
questions.content: Authentication is handled through Next Auth, providing secure and seamless user authentication. This allows for easy management of user sessions and supports various authentication providers.

questions.title: How can I manage subscriptions and payments?
questions.content: Stripe Subscriptions are integrated into the Boilerplate, enabling you to manage billing, subscriptions, and payments effortlessly. This provides a smooth financial transaction experience for both you and your users.

questions.title: Is there support for team collaboration?
questions.content: Yes, the Boilerplate includes a team system feature that enhances productivity and collaboration. It allows team members to work together efficiently, streamlining workflows and project management.

questions.title: How do I track the performance of my application?
questions.content: The Boilerplate features a comprehensive dashboard that offers real-time analytics, allowing you to monitor your applicationâ€™s performance, user engagement, and other key metrics to inform decision-making and strategy optimization.

questions.title: How do I get started with this Micro-SaaS Boilerplate?
questions.content: Getting started is straightforward. Simply clone the Boilerplate repository, configure it according to your projectâ€™s requirements, and youâ€™re ready to start building your Micro-SaaS application. Our documentation and support team are here to assist you throughout the process.
